<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/conversations/{conversation_id}/git/diff"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get git diff for a specific file

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"conversation_id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Conversation ID"},{"name":"path","in":"query","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Path of the file to get diff for"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Git diff","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}}},"500":{"description":"Error getting git diff","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}}
